name: Checkmate!
description:
A classic for great fun, a virtual and improved chess game!
Your objective is to get the checkmate on the enemy king, but it will not be easy to get close to him with so many pieces involved to protect him.
The game also shows the possible moves with each piece, thus making it easier to play or even learn!
Put a time limit and win whoever knocks over pieces in less time, or put no time limit and the winner will be who can give the checkmate!
You can have fun with friends or with the whole family!
Learn how to play or improve your chess skills in a fun way.

Protect you king from a checkmate!
